rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\n                    mutex lock active and return */\n                return rc;\n            }\n        #endif\n\n            /* handle success case */\n            if (rc >= 0) {\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            if (pendResp) {\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                    PRINTF("PendResp Done %p", pendResp);\n                #endif\n                    pendResp = NULL;\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                }\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n            break;\n        }\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\n        default:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!", *mms_stat);\n        #endif\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\n            break;\n        }\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\n#endif\n    {\n        /* reset state */\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\n    }\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    if (readLocked) {\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n    }\n#endif\n    if (rc < 0) {\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n        PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)",\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\n    #endif\n        return rc;\n    }\n\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\n        goto wait_again;\n    }\n\n    return rc;\n}', 'file_suffix': '.c'}, 'id': 'call_FZmzAgB8EJGCjBQzCOdommif', 'type': 'tool_call'}, {'name': 'run_semgrep', 'args': {'code_sample': 'static int MqttClient_WaitType(MqttClient *client, void *packet_obj,\n    byte wait_type, word16 wait_packet_id, int timeout_ms)\n{\n    int rc;\n    word16 packet_id;\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\n    int readLocked;\n#endif\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\n    int waitMatchFound;\n\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\n    }\n\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\n\nwait_again:\n\n    /* initialize variables */\n    packet_id = 0;\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    pendResp = NULL;\n    readLocked = 0;\n#endif\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n    PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d",\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\n#endif\n\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\n    {\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\n            if (rc != 0) {\n                PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!");\n                return rc;\n            }\n            readLocked = 1;\n        #endif\n\n            /* reset the packet state */\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\n    #endif\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\n                        /* pending response is already done, so return */\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                        PRINTF("PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d", pendResp, rc);\n                    #endif\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n                        return rc;\n                    }\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat = */\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\n            if (rc < 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d",\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\n        #endif\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\n        {\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n The analysis indicated that there are multiple instances where `memcpy` is used, and it does not check if the destination buffer is large enough to hold the source data. This is a critical vulnerability (CWE-120) that can be exploited to overwrite memory, potentially leading to arbitrary code execution or crashes.\n\n2. **Improper Handling of Statically-Sized Arrays**:\n   - The code contains statically-sized arrays that may not be adequately sized for the data they are intended to hold. This can lead to buffer overflows or other issues (CWE-119). The analysis suggests that bounds checking should be performed to ensure that the size of the arrays is sufficient.\n\n3. **Concurrency Issues**:\n   - The code uses locks for multithreading (e.g., `wm_SemLock` and `wm_SemUnlock`). While this is necessary for thread safety, there is a risk of deadlocks or race conditions if the locks are not managed correctly. The analysis pointed out that there are potential issues related to the use of locks in a multithreaded environment, which could lead to performance bottlenecks or application hangs.\n\n4. **Dead Code**:\n   - The function `MqttClient_WaitType` is reported as never used, which may indicate that it is dead code. While this does not directly lead to vulnerabilities, it can contribute to code bloat and maintenance challenges.\n\n5. **File Handling Risks**:\n   - The analysis raised concerns about file handling, particularly regarding the potential for symlink attacks or race conditions when opening files. == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\n                        /* pending response is already done, so return */\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                        PRINTF("PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d", pendResp, rc);\n                    #endif\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n                        return rc;\n                    }\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\n\n            /* Wait for packet */\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\n                    timeout_ms);\n            /* handle failure */\n            if (rc <= 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n            /* capture length read */\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\n\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\n            if (rc < 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d",\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\n        #endif\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\n        {\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\n                 MqttIsPubRespPacket(packet_type) == MqttIsPubRespPacket(wait_type)) &&\n               (wait_packet_id == 0 || wait_packet_id == packet_id))\n            {\n                use_packet_obj = packet_obj;\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                /* use generic packet object */\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\n            }\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\n                    mutex lock active and return */\n                return rc;\n            }\n        #endif\n\n            /* handle success case */\n            if (rc >= 0) {\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            if (pendResp) {\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                    PRINTF("PendResp Done %p", pendResp);\n                #endif\n                    pendResp = NULL;\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                }\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n            break;\n        }\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\n        default:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!", *mms_stat);\n        #endif\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\n            break;\n        }\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\n#endif\n    {\n        /* reset state */\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\n    }\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    if (readLocked) {\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n    }\n#endif\n    if (rc < 0) {\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n        PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)",\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\n    #endif\n        return rc;\n    }\n\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\n        goto wait_again;\n    }\n\n    return rc;\n}\n```\n\nOnly reply with the response from your tool call. Do not include any further information.\n', additional_kwargs={}, response_metadata={}), AIMessage(content='', additional_kwargs={'tool_calls': [{'id': 'call_3nVpOzpikzML8RSclU1JvPif', 'function': packet_id;\\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\\n    int readLocked;\\n#endif\\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\\n    int waitMatchFound;\\n\\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\\n    }\\n\\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\\n\\nwait_again:\\n\\n    /* initialize variables */\\n    packet_id = 0;\\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n    pendResp = NULL;\\n    readLocked = 0;\\n#endif\\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n    PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d\\",\\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\\n#endif\\n\\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\\n    {\\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\\n        {\\n        #ifdef         break;\\n            }\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n            PRINTF(\\"Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d\\",\\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type,      MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\\n            void* use_packet_obj;\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\\n            }\\n\\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\\n                 MqttIsPubRespPacket(packet_type) == MqttIsPubRespPacket(wait_type)) &&\\n               (wait_packet_id == 0 || wait_packet_id == packet_id))\\n            {\\n                use_packet_obj = packet_obj;\\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                /* use generic packet object */\\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\\n            }\\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\\n            pendResp = NULL;\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\\n            if (rc == 0) {\\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\\n                }\\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                break; /* error */\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n\\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\\n                    mutex lock active and return */\\n                return rc;\\n            }\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* handle success case */\\n            if (rc >= 0) {\\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\\n            }\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            if (pendResp) {\\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n                    PRINTF(\\"PendResp Done %p\\", pendResp);\\n                #endif\\n                    pendResp = NULL;\\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n                }\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n            break;\\n        }\\n\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\\n        default:\\n        {\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n            PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!\\", *mms_stat);\\n        #endif\\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\\n            break;\\n        }\\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\\n#endif\\n    {\\n        /* reset state */\\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\\n    }\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n    if (readLocked) {\\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\\n    }\\n#endif\\n    if (rc < 0) {\\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n        PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)\\",\\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\\n    #endif\\n        return rc;\\n    }\\n\\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\\n        goto wait_again;\\n    }\\n\\n    return rc;\\n}", "file_suffix": ".c"}', 'name': 'run_appinspector'}, 'type': 'function'}, {'id': mms_stat;\\n    int waitMatchFound;\\n\\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\\n    }\\n\\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat      MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\\n#endif\\n\\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\\n    {\\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\\n        {\\n 'static int MqttClient_WaitType(MqttClient *client, void *packet_obj,\n    byte wait_type, word16 wait_packet_id, int timeout_ms)\n{\n    int rc;\n    word16 packet_id;\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\n    int readLocked;\n#endif\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\n    int waitMatchFound;\n\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\n    }\n\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\n\nwait_again:\n\n    /* initialize variables */\n    packet_id = 0;\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    pendResp = NULL;\n    readLocked = 0;\n#endif\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n    PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d",\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\n#endif\n\n wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\n            if (rc != 0) {\n                PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!");\n                return rc;\n            }\n            readLocked = 1;\n        #endif\n\n            /* reset the packet state */\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\n    #endif\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\n                        /* pending response is already done, so return */\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                        PRINTF("PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d", pendResp, rc);\n                    #endif\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n                        return rc;\n                    }\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\n\n            /* Wait for packet */\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\n                    timeout_ms);\n            /* handle failure */\n            if (rc <= 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n            /* capture length read */\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\n\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\n            if (rc < 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d",\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\n        #endif\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\n        {\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\n                 MqttIsPubRespPacket(packet_type) == MqttIsPubRespPacket(wait_type)) &&\n               (wait_packet_id == 0 || wait_packet_id == packet_id))\n            {\n                use_packet_obj = packet_obj;\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                /* use generic packet object */\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\n            }\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\n                    mutex lock active and return */\n                return rc;\n            }\n        #endif\n\n            /* handle success case */\n            if (rc >= 0) {\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            if (pendResp) {\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                    PRINTF("PendResp Done %p", pendResp);\n                #endif\n                    pendResp = NULL;\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                }\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n            break;\n        }\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\n        default:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!", *mms_stat);\n        #endif\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\n            break;\n        }\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\n#endif\n    {\n        /* reset state */\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\n    }\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    if (readLocked) {\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n    }\n#endif\n    if (rc < 0) {\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n        PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)",\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\n    #endif\n        return rc;\n    }\n\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\n        goto wait_again;\n    }\n\n    return rc;\n}', 'file_suffix': '.c'}, 'id': 'call_3nVpOzpikzML8RSclU1JvPif', 'type': 'tool_call'}, {'name': 'run_cppcheck', 'args': {'code_sample': 'static int MqttClient_WaitType(MqttClient *client, void *packet_obj,\n    byte wait_type, word16 wait_packet_id, int timeout_ms)\n{\n    int rc;\n    word16 packet_id;\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\n    int readLocked;\n#endif\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\n    int waitMatchFound;\n\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\n    }\n\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\n\nwait_again:\n\n    /* initialize variables */\n    packet_id = 0;\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    pendResp = NULL;\n    readLocked = 0;\n#endif\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n    PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d",\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\n#endif\n\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\n    {\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\n            if (rc != 0) {\n                PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!");\n                return rc;\n            }\n            readLocked = 1;\n        #endif\n\n            /* reset the packet state */\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\n    #endif\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\n                        /* pending response is already done, so return */\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                        PRINTF("PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d", pendResp, rc);\n                    #endif\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n                        return rc;\n                    }\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\n\n            /* Wait for packet */\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\n                    timeout_ms);\n            /* handle failure */\n            if (rc <= 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n            /* capture length read */\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\n\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\n            if (rc < 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d",\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\n        #endif\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\n        {\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\n                 MqttIsPubRespPacket(packet_type) == MqttIsPubRespPacket(wait_type)) &&\n               (wait_packet_id == 0 || wait_packet_id == packet_id))\n            {\n                use_packet_obj = packet_obj;\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                /* use generic packet object */\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\n            }\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\n                    mutex lock active and return */\n                return rc;\n            }\n        #endif\n\n            /* handle success case */\n            if (rc >= 0) {\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            if (pendResp) {\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                    PRINTF("PendResp Done %p", pendResp);\n                #endif\n                    pendResp = NULL;\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                }\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n            break;\n        }\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\n        default:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!", *mms_stat);\n        #endif\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\n            break;\n        }\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\n#endif\n    {\n        /* reset state */\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\n    }\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    if (readLocked) {\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n    }\n#endif\n    if (rc < 0) {\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n        PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)",\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\n    #endif\n        return rc;\n    }\n\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\n        goto wait_again;\n    }\n\n    return rc;\n}', 'file_suffix': '.c'}, 'id': 'call_nSfEVp27Mw7CKmAZJRXUftzJ', 'type': 'tool_call'}, {'name': 'run_appinspector', 'args': {'code_sample': 'static int MqttClient_WaitType(MqttClient *client, void *packet_obj,\n    byte wait_type, word16 wait_packet_id, int timeout_ms)\n{\n    int rc;\n    word16 packet_id;\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\n    int readLocked;\n#endif\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\n    int waitMatchFound;\n\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\n    }\n\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\n\nwait_again:\n\n    /* initialize variables */\n    packet_id = 0;\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    pendResp = NULL;\n    readLocked = 0;\n#endif\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n    PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d",\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\n#endif\n\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\n    {\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\n            if (rc != 0) {\n                PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!");\n                return rc;\n            }\n            readLocked = 1;\n        #endif\n\n            /* reset the packet state */\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\n    #endif\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc               /* pending response is already done, so return */\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                        PRINTF("PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d", pendResp, rc);\n                    #endif\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n                        return rc;\n                    }\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\n\n            /* Wait for packet */\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\n                    timeout_ms);\n            /* handle failure */\n */\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\n            if (rc < 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d",\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\n use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n The analysis indicated that there are multiple instances where `memcpy` is used, and it does not check if the destination buffer is large enough to hold the source data. This is a critical vulnerability (CWE-120) that can be exploited to overwrite memory, potentially leading to arbitrary code execution or crashes.\n\n2. **Improper Handling of Statically-Sized Arrays**:\n   - The code contains statically-sized arrays that may not be adequately sized for the data they are intended to hold. This can lead to buffer overflows or other issues (CWE-119). The analysis suggests that bounds checking should be performed to ensure that the size of the arrays is sufficient.\n\n3. **Concurrency Issues**:\n   - The code uses locks for multithreading (e.g., `wm_SemLock` and `wm_SemUnlock`). While this is necessary for thread safety, there is a risk of deadlocks or race conditions if the locks are not managed correctly. The analysis pointed out that there are potential issues related to the use of locks in a multithreaded environment, which could lead to performance bottlenecks or application hangs.\n\n4. **Dead Code**:\n   - The function `MqttClient_WaitType` is reported as never used, which may indicate that it is dead code. While this does not directly lead to vulnerabilities, it can contribute to code bloat and maintenance challenges.\n\n5. **File Handling Risks**:\n   - The analysis raised concerns about file handling, particularly regarding the potential for symlink attacks or race conditions when opening files. readLocked;\n#endif\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\n    int waitMatchFound;\n\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\n    }\n\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\n\nwait_again:\n\n    /* initialize variables */\n    packet_id = 0;\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    pendResp = NULL;\n    readLocked = 0;\n#endif\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n    PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d",\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\n#endif\n\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\n    {\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\n            if (rc != 0) {\n                PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!");\n                return rc;\n            }\n            readLocked = 1;\n        #endif\n\n            /* reset the packet state */\n WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\n                        /* pending response is already done, so return */\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                        PRINTF("PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d", pendResp, rc);\n                    #endif\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n                        return rc;\n                    }\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat =           if (rc <= 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n            /* capture length read */\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\n\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id break;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d",\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\n use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* packet_obj;\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                /* use generic packet object */\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\n            }\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n        &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\n                    mutex lock active and return */\n                return rc;\n            }\n        #endif\n\n            /* handle success case */\n            if (rc >= 0) {\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef %d!", *mms_stat);\n        #endif\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\n            break;\n        }\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\n#endif\n    {\n        /* reset state */\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\n    }\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    if (readLocked) {\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n    }\n#endif\n    if (rc < 0) {\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n        PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)",\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\n    #endif\n        return rc;\n    }\n\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\n        goto wait_again;\n    }\n\n    return rc;\n}\n```\n\nOnly reply with the response from your tool call. wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\\n                        return rc;\\n                    }\\n                }\\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                break; /* error */\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n\\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\\n\\n            /* Wait for packet */\\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\\n                    timeout_ms);\\n            /* handle failure */\\n            if (rc <= 0) {\\n                break;\\n            }\\n\\n            /* capture length read */\\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\\n\\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\\n            if (rc < 0) {\\n                break;\\n            }\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n            PRINTF(\\"Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d\\",\\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\\n        #endif\\n\\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\\n        }\\n        FALL_THROUGH;\\n\\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\\n        {\\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\\n            void* use_packet_obj;\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\\n            }\\n\\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\\n                 MqttIsPubRespPacket(packet_type) == MqttIsPubRespPacket(wait_type)) &&\\n               (wait_packet_id == 0 || wait_packet_id == packet_id))\\n            {\\n                use_packet_obj = packet_obj;\\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                /* use generic packet object */\\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\\n            }\\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\\n            pendResp = NULL;\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\\n            if (rc == 0) {\\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\\n                }\\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                break; /* error */\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n\\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\\n                    mutex lock active and return */\\n                return rc;\\n            }\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* handle success case */\\n            if (rc >= 0) {\\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\\n            }\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            if (pendResp) {\\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n                    PRINTF(\\"PendResp Done %p\\", pendResp);\\n                #endif\\n                    pendResp = NULL;\\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n                }\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n            break;\\n        }\\n\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\\n        default:\\n        {\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n            PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!\\", *mms_stat);\\n        #endif\\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\\n            break;\\n        }\\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\\n#endif\\n    {\\n        /* reset state */\\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\\n    }\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n    if (readLocked) {\\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\\n    }\\n#endif\\n    if (rc < 0) {\\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n        PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)\\",\\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\\n    #endif\\n        return rc;\\n    }\\n\\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\\n        goto wait_again;\\n    }\\n\\n    return rc;\\n}", "file_suffix": ".c"}', 'name': 'run_cppcheck'}, 'type': 'function'}, {'id': 'call_FZmzAgB8EJGCjBQzCOdommif', 'function': {'arguments': '{"code_sample": "static int MqttClient_WaitType(MqttClient *client, void *packet_obj,\\n    byte wait_type, word16 wait_packet_id, int timeout_ms)\\n{\\n    int rc;\\n    word16 packet_id;\\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\\n    int readLocked;\\n#endif\\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\\n    int waitMatchFound;\\n\\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\\n    }\\n\\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\\n\\nwait_again:\\n\\n    /* initialize variables */\\n    packet_id = 0;\\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n    pendResp = NULL;\\n    readLocked = 0;\\n#endif\\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n    PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d\\",\\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\\n#endif\\n\\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\\n    {\\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\\n        {\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\\n            if (rc != 0) {\\n                PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!\\");\\n                return rc;\\n            }\\n            readLocked = 1;\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* reset the packet state */\\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\\n        }\\n        FALL_THROUGH;\\n\\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\\n    #endif\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\\n        {\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\\n            pendResp = NULL;\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\\n            if (rc == 0) {\\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \\n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\\n                        /* pending response is already done, so return */\\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n                        PRINTF(\\"PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d\\", pendResp, rc);\\n                    #endif\\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\\n                        return rc;\\n                    }\\n                }\\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                break; /* error */\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n\\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\\n\\n            /* Wait for packet */\\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\\n                    timeout_ms);\\n            /* handle failure */\\n            if (rc <= 0) {\\n                break;\\n            }\\n\\n            /* capture length read */\\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\\n\\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\\n            if (rc < 0) {\\n                break;\\n            }\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n            PRINTF(\\"Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d\\",\\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\\n        #endif\\n\\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\\n        }\\n        FALL_THROUGH;\\n\\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\\n        {\\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\\n            void* use_packet_obj;\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\\n            }\\n\\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\\n packet_obj;\\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                /* use generic packet object */\\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\\n            }\\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\\n            pendResp = NULL;\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\\n            if (rc == 0) {\\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\\n                }\\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                break; /* error */\\n            }\\n        #endif use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\\n                    mutex lock active and return */\\n                return rc;\\n            }\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* handle success case */\\n            if (rc >= 0) {\\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\\n            }\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            if (pendResp) {\\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n                    PRINTF(\\"PendResp Done %p\\", pendResp);\\n                #endif\\n                    pendResp = NULL;\\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n                }\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n            break;\\n        }\\n\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\\n        default:\\n        {\\n 'static int MqttClient_WaitType(MqttClient *client, void *packet_obj,\n    byte wait_type, word16 wait_packet_id, int timeout_ms)\n{\n    int rc;\n    word16 packet_id;\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\n    int readLocked;\n#endif\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\n    int waitMatchFound;\n\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\n    }\n\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\n\nwait_again:\n\n    /* initialize variables */\n    packet_id = 0;\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    pendResp = NULL;\n    readLocked = 0;\n#endif\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n    PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d",\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\n#endif\n\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\n    {\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\n            if (rc != 0) {\n                PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!");\n                return rc;\n            }\n            readLocked = 1;\n        #endif\n\n            /* reset the packet state */\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\n    #endif\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\n                        /* pending response is already done, so return */\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                        PRINTF("PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d", pendResp, rc);\n                    #endif\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n                        return rc;\n                    }\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\n\n            /* Wait for packet */\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\n                    timeout_ms);\n            /* handle failure */\n            if (rc <= 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n            /* capture length read */\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\n\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\n            if (rc < 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d",\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\n        #endif\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\n        {\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\n                 MqttIsPubRespPacket(packet_type) == MqttIsPubRespPacket(wait_type)) &&\n               (wait_packet_id == 0 || wait_packet_id == packet_id))\n            {\n                use_packet_obj = packet_obj;\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                /* use generic packet object */\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\n            }\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\n                    mutex lock active and return */\n                return rc;\n            }\n        #endif\n\n            /* handle success case */\n            if (rc >= 0) {\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            if (pendResp) {\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                    PRINTF("PendResp Done %p", pendResp);\n                #endif\n                    pendResp = NULL;\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                }\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n            break;\n        }\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\n        default:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!", *mms_stat);\n        #endif\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\n            break;\n        }\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\n#endif\n    {\n        /* reset state */\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\n    }\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    if (readLocked) {\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n    }\n#endif\n    if (rc < 0) {\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n        PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)",\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\n    #endif\n        return rc;\n    }\n\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\n        goto wait_again;\n    }\n\n    return rc;\n}', 'file_suffix': '.c'}, 'id': 'call_3nVpOzpikzML8RSclU1JvPif', 'type': 'tool_call'}, {'name': 'run_cppcheck', 'args': {'code_sample': 'static int MqttClient_WaitType(MqttClient *client, void *packet_obj,\n    byte wait_type, word16 wait_packet_id, int timeout_ms)\n{\n    int rc;\n    word16 packet_id;\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\n    int readLocked;\n#endif\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\n    int waitMatchFound;\n\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\n    }\n\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\n\nwait_again:\n\n    /* initialize variables */\n    packet_id = 0;\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    pendResp = NULL;\n    readLocked = 0;\n#endif\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n    PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d",\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\n#endif\n\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\n    {\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\n            if (rc != 0) {\n                PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!");\n                return rc;\n            }\n            readLocked = 1;\n        #endif\n\n            /* reset the packet state */\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\n    #endif\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\n                        /* pending response is already done, so return */\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                        PRINTF("PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d", pendResp, rc);\n                    #endif\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n                        return rc;\n                    }\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\n\n            /* Wait for packet */\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\n                    timeout_ms);\n            /* handle failure */\n            if (rc <= 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n            /* capture length read */\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\n\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\n            if (rc < 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d",\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\n        #endif\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\n        {\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* packet_obj;\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                /* use generic packet object */\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\n            }\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\n                    mutex lock active and return */\n                return rc;\n            }\n        #endif\n\n            /* handle success case */\n            if (rc >= 0) {\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            if (pendResp) {\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                    PRINTF("PendResp Done %p", pendResp);\n                #endif\n                    pendResp = NULL;\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                }\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n            break;\n        }\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\n        default:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!", *mms_stat);\n        #endif\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\n            break;\n        }\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\n#endif\n    {\n        /* reset state */\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\n    }\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    if (readLocked) {\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n    }\n#endif\n    if (rc < 0) {\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n        PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)",\n WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\n                    mutex lock active and return */\n WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\n    int readLocked;\n#endif\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\n    int waitMatchFound;\n\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\n        return   PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d",\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\n#endif\n\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\n    {\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\n            if (rc != 0) {\n                PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!");\n                return rc;\n            }\n            readLocked = 1;\n        #endif\n\n            /* reset the packet state */\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\n    #endif\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\n        {\n        #ifdef == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\n PRINTF("PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d", pendResp, rc);\n                    #endif\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n                        return rc;\n                    }\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\n\n            /* Wait for packet */\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\n                    timeout_ms);\n            /* handle failure */\n            if (rc <= 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n            /* capture length read */\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\n\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\n            if (rc < 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d",\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\n        #endif\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\n        {\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\n                 MqttIsPubRespPacket(packet_type) == MqttIsPubRespPacket(wait_type)) &&\n               (wait_packet_id == 0 || wait_packet_id == packet_id))\n            {\n                use_packet_obj = packet_obj;\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                /* use generic packet object */\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\n            }\n
