packet_obj;\\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                /* use generic packet object */\\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\\n            }\\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\\n            pendResp = NULL;\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\\n            if (rc == 0) {\\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\\n                }\\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                break; /* error */\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n\\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\\n                    mutex lock active and return */\\n                return rc;\\n            }\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* handle success case */\\n            if (rc >= 0) {\\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\\n            }\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            if (pendResp) {\\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n                    PRINTF(\\"PendResp Done %p\\", pendResp);\\n                #endif\\n                    pendResp = NULL;\\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n                }\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n            break;\\n        }\\n\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\\n        default:\\n        {\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n            PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!\\", *mms_stat);\\n        #endif\\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\\n            break;\\n        }\\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\\n#endif\\n    {\\n        /* reset state */\\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\\n    }\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n    if (readLocked) {\\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\\n    }\\n#endif\\n    if (rc < 0) {\\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n        PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)\\",\\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\\n    #endif\\n        return rc;\\n    }\\n\\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\\n        goto wait_again;\\n    }\\n\\n    return rc;\\n}", "file_suffix": ".c"}', 'name': 'run_flawfinder'}, 'type': 'function'}, {'id': 'call_nSfEVp27Mw7CKmAZJRXUftzJ', 'function': {'arguments': '{"code_sample": "static int MqttClient_WaitType(MqttClient *client, void *packet_obj,\\n    byte wait_type, word16 wait_packet_id, int timeout_ms)\\n{\\n    int rc;\\n    word16 packet_id;\\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\\n    int readLocked;\\n#endif\\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\\n    int waitMatchFound;\\n\\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\\n    }\\n\\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\\n\\nwait_again:\\n\\n    /* initialize variables */\\n    packet_id = 0;\\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n    pendResp = NULL;\\n    readLocked = 0;\\n#endif\\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n    PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d\\",\\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\\n#endif\\n\\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\\n    {\\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\\n        {\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\\n            if (rc != 0) {\\n                PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!\\");\\n                return rc;\\n            }\\n            readLocked = 1;\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* reset the packet state */\\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\\n        }\\n        FALL_THROUGH;\\n\\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\\n    #endif\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\\n        {\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\\n            pendResp = NULL;\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\\n            if (rc == 0) {\\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \\n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\\n                        /* pending response is already done, so return */\\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n                        PRINTF(\\"PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d\\", pendResp, rc);\\n                    #endif\\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\\n                        return rc;\\n                    }\\n                }\\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                break; /* error */\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n\\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\\n\\n            /* Wait for packet */\\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\\n                    timeout_ms);\\n            /* handle failure */\\n            if (rc <= 0) {\\n                break;\\n            }\\n\\n            /* capture length read */\\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\\n\\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\\n            if (rc < 0) {\\n                break;\\n            }\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n            PRINTF(\\"Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d\\",\\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\\n        #endif\\n\\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\\n        }\\n        FALL_THROUGH;\\n\\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\\n        {\\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\\n            void* use_packet_obj;\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\\n            }\\n\\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\\n                 MqttIsPubRespPacket(packet_type) == MqttIsPubRespPacket(wait_type)) &&\\n               (wait_packet_id == 0 || wait_packet_id == packet_id))\\n            {\\n                use_packet_obj = packet_obj;\\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                /* use generic packet object */\\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\\n            }\\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\\n            pendResp = NULL;\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\\n            if (rc == 0) {\\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\\n                }\\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                break; /* error */\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n\\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\\n                    mutex lock active and return */\\n                return rc;\\n            }\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* handle success case */\\n            if (rc >= 0) {\\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\\n            }\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            if (pendResp) {\\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n                    PRINTF(\\"PendResp Done %p\\", pendResp);\\n                #endif\\n                    pendResp = NULL;\\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n                }\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n            break;\\n        }\\n\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\\n        default:\\n        {\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n            PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!\\", *mms_stat);\\n        #endif\\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\\n            break;\\n        }\\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\\n#endif\\n    {\\n        /* reset state */\\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\\n    }\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n    if (readLocked) {\\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\\n    }\\n#endif\\n    if (rc < 0) {\\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n        PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)\\",\\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\\n    #endif\\n        return rc;\\n    }\\n\\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\\n        goto wait_again;\\n    }\\n\\n    return rc;\\n}", "file_suffix": ".c"}', 'name': 'run_cppcheck'}, 'type': 'function'}, {'id':           }\\n\\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\\n }\\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\\n            pendResp = NULL;\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\\n            if (rc == 0) {\\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\\n                }\\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                break; /* error */\\n            }\\n        #endif use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\\n timeout_ms)\\n{\\n    int rc;\\n    word16 packet_id;\\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\\n    int readLocked;\\n#endif\\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\\n    int waitMatchFound;\\n\\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\\n    }\\n\\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\\n\\nwait_again:\\n\\n    /* initialize variables */\\n    packet_id = 0;\\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n    pendResp = NULL;\\n    readLocked = 0;\\n#endif\\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n    PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d\\",\\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\\n#endif\\n\\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\\n    {\\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\\n        {\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\\n            if (rc != 0) {\\n                PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!\\");\\n                return rc;\\n            }\\n            readLocked = 1;\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* reset the packet state */\\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\\n        }\\n        FALL_THROUGH;\\n\\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\\n    #endif\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\\n        {\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\\n            pendResp = NULL;\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\\n            if (rc == 0) {\\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \\n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\\n                        /* pending response is already done, so return */\\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n                        PRINTF(\\"PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d\\", pendResp, rc);\\n                    #endif\\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\\n                        return rc;\\n                    }\\n                }\\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                break; /* error */\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n\\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\\n\\n            /* Wait for packet */\\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\\n                    timeout_ms);\\n            /* handle failure */\\n            if (rc <= 0) {\\n                break;\\n            }\\n\\n            /* capture length read */\\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\\n\\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\\n            if (rc < 0) {\\n                break;\\n            }\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n            PRINTF(\\"Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d\\",\\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\\n        #endif\\n\\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\\n        }\\n        FALL_THROUGH;\\n\\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\\n        {\\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\\n            void* use_packet_obj;\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\\n            }\\n\\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\\n                 MqttIsPubRespPacket(packet_type) == MqttIsPubRespPacket(wait_type)) &&\\n               (wait_packet_id == 0 || wait_packet_id == packet_id))\\n            {\\n                use_packet_obj = packet_obj;\\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                /* use generic packet object */\\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\\n            }\\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\\n            pendResp = NULL;\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\\n            if (rc == 0) {\\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\\n                }\\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                break; /* error */\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n\\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\\n 'static int MqttClient_WaitType(MqttClient *client, void *packet_obj,\n    byte wait_type, word16 wait_packet_id, int timeout_ms)\n{\n    int rc;\n    word16 packet_id;\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\n    int readLocked;\n#endif\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\n    int waitMatchFound;\n\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\n    }\n\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\n\nwait_again:\n\n    /* initialize variables */\n    packet_id = 0;\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    pendResp = NULL;\n    readLocked = 0;\n#endif\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n    PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d",\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\n#endif\n\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\n    {\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\n            if (rc != 0) {\n                PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!");\n                return rc;\n            }\n            readLocked = 1;\n        #endif\n\n            /* reset the packet state */\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\n    #endif\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\n                        /* pending response is already done, so return */\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                        PRINTF("PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d", pendResp, rc);\n                    #endif\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n                        return rc;\n                    }\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\n\n            /* Wait for packet */\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\n                    timeout_ms);\n            /* handle failure */\n            if (rc <= 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n            /* capture length read */\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\n\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\n            if (rc < 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d",\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\n        #endif\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\n        {\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\n                 MqttIsPubRespPacket(packet_type) == MqttIsPubRespPacket(wait_type)) &&\n               (wait_packet_id == 0 || wait_packet_id == packet_id))\n            {\n                use_packet_obj = packet_obj;\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                /* use generic packet object */\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\n            }\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\n                    mutex lock active and return */\n                return rc;\n            }\n        #endif\n\n            /* handle success case */\n            if (rc >= 0) {\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            if (pendResp) {\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                    PRINTF("PendResp Done %p", pendResp);\n                #endif\n                    pendResp = NULL;\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                }\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n            break;\n        }\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\n        default:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!", *mms_stat);\n        #endif\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\n            break;\n        }\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\n#endif\n    {\n        /* reset state */\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\n    }\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    if (readLocked) {\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n    }\n#endif\n    if (rc < 0) {\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n        PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)",\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\n    #endif\n        return rc;\n    }\n\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\n        goto packet_id = 0;\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    pendResp = NULL;\n    readLocked = 0;\n#endif\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n    PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d",\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\n#endif\n\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\n    {\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\n            if (rc != 0) {\n                PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!");\n                return rc;\n            }\n            readLocked = 1;\n        #endif\n\n            /* reset the packet state */\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\n    #endif\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n                        return rc;\n                    }\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\n\n            /* Wait for packet */\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\n                    timeout_ms);\n            /* handle failure */\n            if (rc <= 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n            /* capture length read */\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\n\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\n            if (rc < 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d",\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\n        #endif\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\n        {\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\n                 MqttIsPubRespPacket(packet_type) == MqttIsPubRespPacket(wait_type)) &&\n               (wait_packet_id == 0 || wait_packet_id == packet_id))\n            {\n                use_packet_obj = packet_obj;\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                /* use generic packet object */\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\n            }\n rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\n                    mutex lock active and return */\n                return rc;\n            }\n        #endif\n\n            /* handle success case */\n            if (rc >= 0) {\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            if (pendResp) {\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                    PRINTF("PendResp Done %p", pendResp);\n                #endif\n                    pendResp = NULL;\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                }\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n            break;\n        }\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\n        default:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!", *mms_stat);\n        #endif\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\n            break;\n        }\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\n#endif\n    {\n        /* reset state */\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\n    }\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    if (readLocked) {\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n    }\n#endif\n    if (rc < 0) {\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n        PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)",\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\n    #endif\n        return rc;\n    }\n\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\n        goto MqttClient_WaitType(MqttClient *client, void *packet_obj,\n    byte wait_type, word16 wait_packet_id, int timeout_ms)\n{\n    int rc;\n    word16 packet_id;\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\n    int readLocked;\n#endif\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\n    int waitMatchFound;\n\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\n    }\n\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\n\nwait_again:\n\n    /* initialize variables */\n    packet_id = 0;\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    pendResp = NULL;\n    readLocked = 0;\n#endif\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n    PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d",\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\n#endif\n\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\n    {\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\n            if (rc != 0) {\n                PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!");\n                return rc;\n            }\n            readLocked = 1;\n        #endif\n\n            /* reset the packet state */\n WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\n\n            /* Wait for packet */\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\n                    timeout_ms);\n            /* handle failure */\n #endif\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\n        {\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\n#endif\n    {\n        /* reset state */\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\n    }\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    if (readLocked) {\n Please summarize the following results:\nFINAL ANALYSIS:\n\nAfter considering the previous analysis and the responses to the questions, the vulnerabilities identified in the original code sample remain valid and require attention. Heres a refined evaluation based on the additional context:\n\n1. **Buffer Overflow Risks**:\n   - The use of `memcpy` without bounds checking is a significant concern. To prevent buffer overflows, it is essential to ensure that the destination buffer is always large enough to accommodate the source data. This can be achieved by using safer alternatives like `strncpy` or `snprintf`, which allow for size limits to be specified.\n\n2. **Improper Handling of Statically-Sized Arrays**:\n   - Statically-sized arrays can lead to buffer overflows if the data being stored exceeds the allocated size. To mitigate this risk, it is crucial to perform bounds checking before writing to these arrays. Additionally, using dynamic memory allocation (e.g., `malloc` and `free`) can provide more flexibility in managing memory sizes.\n\n3. **Concurrency Issues**:\n   - The code employs locks for thread safety, which is necessary in a multithreaded environment. However, to avoid deadlocks, it is important to establish a consistent locking order and to use timeout mechanisms when acquiring locks. Additionally, using higher-level abstractions like mutexes or condition variables can help manage concurrency more effectively.\n\n4. **Dead Code**:\n   - The presence of the unused function `MqttClient_WaitType` suggests that there may be parts of the codebase that are not actively maintained or tested. While this does not directly introduce vulnerabilities, it can lead to confusion and maintenance challenges. It is advisable to remove or refactor dead code to improve code clarity and maintainability.\n\n5. **File Handling Risks**:\n   - The concerns regarding file handling, particularly with symlink attacks and race conditions, highlight the need for secure file operations. To mitigate these risks, it is recommended to use absolute paths, validate file permissions, and implement checks to ensure that the file being accessed is not a symlink or a special file type.\n\nIn conclusion, the code sample exhibits several vulnerabilities that could be exploited if not addressed.               /* pending response is already done, so return */\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                        PRINTF("PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d", pendResp, rc);\n                    #endif\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\n wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat =           if (rc <= 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n            /* capture length read */\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\n\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\n            if (rc < 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d",\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\n        #endif\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\n        {\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* packet_obj;\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                /* use generic packet object */\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\n            }\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n        &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n return rc;\n            }\n        #endif\n\n            /* handle success case */\n            if (rc >= 0) {\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef %d!", *mms_stat);\n        #endif\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\n            break;\n        }\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\n#endif\n    {\n        /* reset state */\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\n    }\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    if (readLocked) {\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n    }\n#endif\n    if (rc < 0) {\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n        PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)",\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\n    #endif\n        return rc;\n    }\n\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\n        goto mms_stat;\\n    int waitMatchFound;\\n\\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\\n    }\\n\\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\\n\\nwait_again:\\n\\n    /* initialize variables */\\n    packet_id = 0;\\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n    pendResp = NULL;\\n    readLocked = 0;\\n#endif\\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n    PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d\\",\\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\\n#endif\\n\\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\\n    {\\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\\n        {\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\\n            if (rc != 0) {\\n                PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!\\");\\n                return rc;\\n            }\\n            readLocked = 1;\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* reset the packet state */\\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\\n        }\\n        FALL_THROUGH;\\n\\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\\n    #endif\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\\n        {\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\\n            pendResp = NULL;\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\\n            if (rc == 0) {\\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \\n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\\n                        /* pending response is already done, so return */\\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n                        PRINTF(\\"PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d\\", pendResp, rc);\\n                    #endif\\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\\n                        return rc;\\n                    }\\n                }\\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                break; /* error */\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n\\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\\n\\n            /* Wait for packet */\\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\\n                    timeout_ms);\\n            /* handle failure */\\n            if (rc <= 0) {\\n                break;\\n            }\\n\\n            /* capture length read */\\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\\n\\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\\n            if (rc < 0) {\\n                break;\\n            }\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n            PRINTF(\\"Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d\\",\\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\\n        #endif\\n\\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\\n        }\\n        FALL_THROUGH;\\n\\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\\n        {\\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\\n            void* use_packet_obj;\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\\n            }\\n\\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\\n                 MqttIsPubRespPacket(packet_type) == MqttIsPubRespPacket(wait_type)) &&\\n               (wait_packet_id == 0 || wait_packet_id == packet_id))\\n            {\\n                use_packet_obj = packet_obj;\\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                /* use generic packet object */\\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\\n            }\\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\\n            pendResp = NULL;\\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\\n            if (rc == 0) {\\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\\n                }\\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n            }\\n            else {\\n                break; /* error */\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n\\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\\n                    mutex lock active and return */\\n                return rc;\\n            }\\n        #endif\\n\\n            /* handle success case */\\n            if (rc >= 0) {\\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\\n            }\\n\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n            if (pendResp) {\\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n                    PRINTF(\\"PendResp Done %p\\", pendResp);\\n                #endif\\n                    pendResp = NULL;\\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\\n                }\\n            }\\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\\n            break;\\n        }\\n\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\\n        default:\\n        {\\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n            PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!\\", *mms_stat);\\n        #endif\\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\\n            break;\\n        }\\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\\n#endif\\n    {\\n        /* reset state */\\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\\n    }\\n\\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\\n    if (readLocked) {\\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\\n    }\\n#endif\\n    if (rc < 0) {\\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\\n        PRINTF(\\"MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)\\",\\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\\n    #endif\\n        return rc;\\n    }\\n\\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\\n        goto wait_again;\\n    }\\n\\n    return rc;\\n}", "file_suffix": ".c"}', 'name': 'run_appinspector'}, 'type': 'function'}, {'id': 'static int MqttClient_WaitType(MqttClient *client, void *packet_obj,\n    byte wait_type, word16 wait_packet_id, int timeout_ms)\n{\n    int rc;\n    word16 packet_id;\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\n    int readLocked;\n#endif\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\n    int waitMatchFound;\n\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\n    }\n\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\n\nwait_again:\n\n    /* initialize variables */\n    packet_id = 0;\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    pendResp = NULL;\n    readLocked = 0;\n#endif\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n    PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d",\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\n#endif\n\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\n    {\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\n            if (rc != 0) {\n                PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!");\n                return rc;\n            }\n            readLocked = 1;\n        #endif\n\n            /* reset the packet state */\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\n    #endif\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\n                        /* pending response is already done, so return */\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                        PRINTF("PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d", pendResp, rc);\n                    #endif\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n                        return rc;\n                    }\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\n\n            /* Wait for packet */\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\n                    timeout_ms);\n            /* handle failure */\n            if (rc <= 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n            /* capture length read */\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\n\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\n            if (rc < 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d",\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\n        #endif\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\n        {\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\n                 MqttIsPubRespPacket(packet_type) == MqttIsPubRespPacket(wait_type)) &&\n               (wait_packet_id == 0 || wait_packet_id == packet_id))\n            {\n                use_packet_obj = packet_obj;\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                /* use generic packet object */\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\n            }\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\n                    mutex lock active and return */\n                return rc;\n            }\n        #endif\n\n            /* handle success case */\n            if (rc >= 0) {\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            if (pendResp) {\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                    PRINTF("PendResp Done %p", pendResp);\n                #endif\n                    pendResp = NULL;\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                }\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n            break;\n        }\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\n        default:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!", *mms_stat);\n        #endif\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\n            break;\n        }\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\n#endif\n    {\n        /* reset state */\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\n    }\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    if (readLocked) {\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n    }\n#endif\n    if (rc < 0) {\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n        PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)",\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\n    #endif\n        return rc;\n    }\n\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\n        goto wait_again;\n    }\n\n    return rc;\n}', 'file_suffix': '.c'}, 'id': 'call_3nVpOzpikzML8RSclU1JvPif', 'type': 'tool_call'}, {'name': 'run_cppcheck', 'args': {'code_sample': 'static int MqttClient_WaitType(MqttClient *client, void *packet_obj,\n    byte wait_type, word16 wait_packet_id, int timeout_ms)\n{\n    int rc;\n    word16 packet_id;\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\n    int readLocked;\n#endif\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\n    int waitMatchFound;\n\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\n    }\n\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\n\nwait_again:\n\n    /* initialize variables */\n    packet_id = 0;\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    pendResp = NULL;\n    readLocked = 0;\n#endif\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n    PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d",\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\n#endif\n\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\n    {\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\n            if (rc != 0) {\n                PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!");\n                return rc;\n            }\n            readLocked = 1;\n        #endif\n\n            /* reset the packet state */\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\n    #endif\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if packet type and id have already completed */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, (MqttPacketType)wait_type, \n                    wait_packet_id, &pendResp)) {\n                    if (pendResp->packetDone) {\n                        /* pending response is already done, so return */\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                        PRINTF("PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d", pendResp, rc);\n                    #endif\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n                        return rc;\n                    }\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_WAIT;\n\n            /* Wait for packet */\n            rc = MqttPacket_Read(client, client->rx_buf, client->rx_buf_len,\n                    timeout_ms);\n            /* handle failure */\n            if (rc <= 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n            /* capture length read */\n            client->packet.buf_len = rc;\n\n            /* Decode Packet - get type and id */\n            rc = MqttClient_DecodePacket(client, client->rx_buf,\n                client->packet.buf_len, NULL, &packet_type, NULL, &packet_id);\n            if (rc < 0) {\n                break;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("Read Packet: Len %d, Type %d, ID %d",\n                client->packet.buf_len, packet_type, packet_id);\n        #endif\n\n            *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_READ;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ:\n        case MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD:\n        {\n            MqttPacketType use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* Determine if we received data for this request */\n            if ((wait_type == MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_ANY ||\n                 wait_type == packet_type ||\n                 MqttIsPubRespPacket(packet_type) == MqttIsPubRespPacket(wait_type)) &&\n               (wait_packet_id == 0 || wait_packet_id == packet_id))\n            {\n                use_packet_obj = packet_obj;\n                waitMatchFound = 1;\n            }\n            else {\n                /* use generic packet object */\n                use_packet_obj = &client->msg;\n            }\n            use_packet_type = packet_type;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Check to see if we have a pending response for this packet */\n            pendResp = NULL;\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            /* Perform packet handling for publish callback and QoS */\n            rc = MqttClient_HandlePacket(client, use_packet_type,\n                use_packet_obj, timeout_ms);\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\n                    mutex lock active and return */\n                return rc;\n            }\n        #endif\n\n            /* handle success case */\n            if (rc >= 0) {\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            if (pendResp) {\n                /* Mark pending response entry done */\n                if (wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient) == 0) {\n                    pendResp->packetDone = 1;\n                    pendResp->packet_ret = rc;\n                #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                    PRINTF("PendResp Done %p", pendResp);\n                #endif\n                    pendResp = NULL;\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                }\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n            break;\n        }\n\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE:\n        case MQTT_MSG_WRITE_PAYLOAD:\n        default:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n            PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Invalid state %d!", *mms_stat);\n        #endif\n            rc = MQTT_CODE_ERROR_STAT;\n            break;\n        }\n    } /* switch (*mms_stat) */\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n    if (rc != MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE)\n#endif\n    {\n        /* reset state */\n        *mms_stat = MQTT_MSG_BEGIN;\n    }\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    if (readLocked) {\n        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n    }\n#endif\n    if (rc < 0) {\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n        PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Failure: %s (%d)",\n            MqttClient_ReturnCodeToString(rc), rc);\n    #endif\n        return rc;\n    }\n\n    if (!waitMatchFound) {\n        /* if we get here, then the we are still waiting for a packet */\n        goto wait_again;\n    }\n\n    return rc;\n}', 'file_suffix': '.c'}, 'id': 'call_nSfEVp27Mw7CKmAZJRXUftzJ', 'type': 'tool_call'}, {'name': 'run_appinspector', 'args': {'code_sample': 'static int MqttClient_WaitType(MqttClient *client, void *packet_obj,\n    byte wait_type, word16 wait_packet_id, int timeout_ms)\n{\n    int rc;\n    word16 packet_id;\n    MqttPacketType packet_type;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    MqttPendResp *pendResp;\n    int readLocked;\n#endif\n    MqttMsgStat* mms_stat;\n    int waitMatchFound;\n\n    if (client == NULL || packet_obj == NULL) {\n        return MQTT_CODE_ERROR_BAD_ARG;\n    }\n\n    /* all packet type structures must have MqttMsgStat at top */\n    mms_stat = (MqttMsgStat*)packet_obj;\n\nwait_again:\n\n    /* initialize variables */\n    packet_id = 0;\n    packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_RESERVED;\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n    pendResp = NULL;\n    readLocked = 0;\n#endif\n    waitMatchFound = 0;\n\n#ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n    PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: Type %s (%d), ID %d",\n        MqttPacket_TypeDesc((MqttPacketType)wait_type),\n            wait_type, wait_packet_id);\n#endif\n\n    switch ((int)*mms_stat)\n    {\n        case MQTT_MSG_BEGIN:\n        {\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            /* Lock recv socket mutex */\n            rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockRecv);\n            if (rc != 0) {\n                PRINTF("MqttClient_WaitType: recv lock error!");\n                return rc;\n            }\n            readLocked = 1;\n        #endif\n\n            /* reset the packet state */\n            client->packet.stat = MQTT_PK_BEGIN;\n        }\n        FALL_THROUGH;\n\n    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_V5\n        case MQTT_MSG_AUTH:\n    #endif\n        case MQTT_MSG_WAIT:\n        {\n        #ifdef               /* pending response is already done, so return */\n                        rc = pendResp->packet_ret;\n                    #ifdef WOLFMQTT_DEBUG_CLIENT\n                        PRINTF("PendResp already Done %p: Rc %d", pendResp, rc);\n                    #endif\n                        MqttClient_RespList_Remove(client, pendResp);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                        wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockRecv);\n                        return rc;\n                    }\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n            *mms_stat = use_packet_type;\n            void* use_packet_obj;\n\n        #ifdef WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD\n            readLocked = 1; /* if in this state read is locked */\n        #endif\n\n            /* read payload state only happens for publish messages */\n            if (*mms_stat == MQTT_MSG_READ_PAYLOAD) {\n                packet_type = MQTT_PACKET_TYPE_PUBLISH;\n            }\n\n            /* rc = wm_SemLock(&client->lockClient);\n            if (rc == 0) {\n                if (MqttClient_RespList_Find(client, packet_type, packet_id,\n                                                               &pendResp)) {\n                    /* we found packet match this incoming read packet */\n                    pendResp->packetProcessing = 1;\n                    use_packet_obj = pendResp->packet_obj;\n                    use_packet_type = pendResp->packet_type;\n                    /* req from another thread... not a match */\n                    waitMatchFound = 0;\n                }\n                wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n            }\n            else {\n                break; /* error */\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n\n WOLFMQTT_NONBLOCK\n            if (rc == MQTT_CODE_CONTINUE) {\n                /* we have received some data, so keep the recv\n                    mutex lock active and return */\n                return rc;\n            }\n        #endif\n\n            /* handle success case */\n            if (rc >= 0) {\n                rc = MQTT_CODE_SUCCESS;\n            }\n\n        #ifdef #endif\n                    pendResp = NULL;\n                    wm_SemUnlock(&client->lockClient);\n                }\n            }\n        #endif /* WOLFMQTT_MULTITHREAD */\n            break;\n
